channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: There’s New Hope for an HIV Vaccine
item.description: A trial vaccine has succeeded in generating low levels of antibodies needed to target HIV. It’s a first but much-needed step toward preventing infecti...

item.title: YouTube TV’s ‘multiview’ feature is now available on Android phones and tablets
item.description: YouTube TV has announced that its ‘multiview’ feature for watching four streams at once is now available on Android phones and tablets. The Android la...

item.title: The Race to Buy TikTok Is On—but There Might Not Be a Winner
item.description: Investors are interested in buying TikTok so that it can avoid a US ban. But even if ByteDance accepts, a takeover will be far from simple.

item.title: Two students uncover security bug that could let millions do their laundry for free
item.description: CSC ServiceWorks provides laundry machines to thousands of residential homes and universities, but the company ignored requests to fix a security bug....

item.title: OpenAI’s Long-Term AI Risk Team Has Disbanded
item.description: The entire OpenAI team focused on the existential dangers of AI has either resigned or been absorbed into other research groups, WIRED has confirmed.

item.title: OpenAI created a team to control ‘superintelligent’ AI —then let it wither, source says
item.description: OpenAI’s Superalignment team, responsible for developing ways to govern and steer “superintelligent” AI systems, was promised 20% of the company’s com...

item.title: Twitter Is Finally Dead. It’s X All the Way Down
item.description: Twitter is fully X.com now. Given its transformation since Elon Musk bought it, that may be a small mercy.

item.title: Harness the TechCrunch Effect: Host a Side Event at Disrupt 2024
item.description: TechCrunch Disrupt 2024 is just around the corner, and the buzz is palpable. But what if we told you there’s a chance for you to not just attend, but ...

item.title: 9 Best Coolers WIRED Tested For Every Budget, Any Situation
item.description: We chugged chilled beverages to bring you our favorite coolers for every situation.

item.title: Pitch Deck Teardown: Goodcarbon’s $5.5M seed deck
item.description: Decks are all about telling a compelling story and Goodcarbon does a good job on that front. But there's important information missing too. © 2024 Tec...
